scripts.dev:extract: lerna run build && lerna run dev:extract
scripts.dev: lerna run build && lerna run dev:react
scripts.docs: lerna run build && lerna run docs:react
scripts.publish:patch: lerna version patch --force-publish --no-changelog && lerna publish from-package
scripts.publish:minor: lerna version minor --force-publish --no-changelog && lerna publish from-package
scripts.publish:major: lerna version major --force-publish --no-changelog && lerna publish from-package
